casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Cooper, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Cooper (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 107.]

(No. 98-677 Submitted August 19, 1998-r Decided September 16, 1998.) David H. Bodiker, State Public Defender, and Thomas R. Wetterer, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Rush (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 53, 697 N.E.2d 634.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
